org.fujion.plotly.layout

Class LayoutOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.plotly.layout.LayoutOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class LayoutOptions
extends Options
    Options for the chart layout. Note that width, height, and margin are not present here. They are taken from the CSS styles applied to the widget container.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Field Detail

      • angularaxis

        @Option
public final LayoutAxisOptions angularaxis
        Options for angular axis.

      • annotations

        @Option
public final AnnotationOptions annotations
        Options for layout annotations.

      • autosize

        @Option
public Boolean autosize
        Determines whether or not a layout width or height that has been left undefined by the user is initialized on each relayout. Note that, regardless of this attribute, an undefined layout width or height is always initialized on the first call to plot.

      • calendar

        @Option
public CalendarTypeEnum calendar
        The default calendar system to use for interpreting and displaying dates throughout the plot.

      • colorway

        @Option
public String colorway
        The default trace colors.

      • direction

        @Option
public PolarDirectionEnum direction
        The direction corresponding to positive angles.

      • dragmode

        @Option
public LayoutOptions.DragModeEnum dragmode
        Determines the mode of drag interactions. SELECT and LASSO apply only to scatter traces with markers or text. ORBIT and TURNTABLE apply only to 3D scenes.

        Default: ZOOM

      • font

        @Option
public final FontOptions font
        The global font. Note that fonts used in traces and other layout components inherit from the global font.

        Default: "Open Sans, verdana, arial, sans-serif"

      • geo

        @Option
public final GeoOptions geo
        Layout options for geo.

      • hidesources

        @Option
public Boolean hidesources
        Determines whether or not a text link citing the data source is placed at the bottom-right cored of the figure. Has only an effect only on graphs that have been generated via forked graphs from the plotly service (at https://plot.ly or on-premise).

      • hoverdistance

        @Option
public Integer hoverdistance
        The default distance (in pixels) to look for data to add hover labels (-1 means no cutoff, 0 means no looking for data).

        Default: 20

      • hoverlabel

        @Option
public final HoverLabelOptions hoverlabel
        Options for hover label. Note: do not use HoverLabelOptions.namelength$array form.

      • hovermode

        @Option
public LayoutOptions.HoverModeEnum hovermode
        Determines the mode of hover interactions.

      • images

        @Option
public final ImageOptions images
        Options for images.

      • legend

        @Option
public final LegendOptions legend
        Legend options.

      • mapbox

        @Option
public final MapboxOptions mapbox
        Options for mapbox plots.

      • orientation

        @Option
public Double orientation
        For polar plots only. Rotates the entire polar by the given angle.

      • paper_bgcolor

        @Option
public String paper_bgcolor
        The color of paper where the graph is drawn.

        Default: "#fff"

      • plot_bgcolor

        @Option
public String plot_bgcolor
        The color of plotting area in-between x and y axes.

        Default: "#fff"

      • polar

        @Option
public final PolarOptions polar
        Options for polar plots.

      • radialaxis

        @Option
public final LayoutAxisOptions radialaxis
        Options for radial axes.

      • scene

        @Option
public final SceneOptions scene
        Options for scenes.

      • separators

        @Option
public String separators
        The decimal and thousand separators. For example, ". " puts a '.' before decimals and a space between thousands. In English locales, dflt is ".," but other locales may alter this default.

      • shapes

        @Option
public final ShapeOptions shapes
        Options for shapes.

      • showlegend

        @Option
public Boolean showlegend
        Determines whether or not a legend is drawn.

      • sliders

        @Option
public final SliderOptions sliders
        Options for slider controls.

      • spikedistance

        @Option
public Integer spikedistance
        The default distance (in pixels) to look for data to draw spikelines to (-1 means no cutoff, 0 means no looking for data).

        Default: 20

      • ternary

        @Option
public final TernaryOptions ternary
        Options for ternary plots.

      • title

        @Option
public String title
        The chart's title.

      • titlefont

        @Option
public final FontOptions titlefont
        The title font.

      • updatemenus

        @Option
public final UpdateMenuOptions updatemenus
        Options for update menus.

      • xaxis

        @Option
public final XYZAxisOptions xaxis
        Default options for x axis.

      • yaxis

        @Option
public final XYZAxisOptions yaxis
        Default options for y axis;
